item.title: Anggie add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Anggie add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everyone." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "A wise girl kisses but doesn't love, listens but doesn't believe, and leaves before she is left." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Never tell the truth to people who are not worthy of it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "What you're supposed to do when you don't like a thing is change it. If you can't change it, change the way you think about it. Don't complain." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Anggie add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I am good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I am not the devil. I am just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Sam Levenson
item.description: "For Attractive lips, speak words of kindness. &emsp;For lovely eyes, seek out the good in people. &emsp;For a slim figure, share your food with the hungry. &emsp;For beautiful hair, let a child run their fingers through it once a day. &emsp;For poise, walk with the knowledge that you never walk alone. &emsp;People, more than things, have to be restored, renewed, revived, reclaimed, and redeemed. Remember, if you ever need a helping hand, you will find one at the end of each of your arms. &emsp;As you grow older, you will discover that you have two hands, one for helping yourself and the other for helping others." -- Sam Levenson

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Love is needing someone. Love is putting up with someone's bad qualities because they somehow complete you." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Bette Midler
item.description: "Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world." -- Bette Midler

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Pamela Redmond Satran
item.description: "A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE .... enough money within her control to move out and rent a place of her own even if she never wants to or needs to... A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE .... something perfect to wear if the employer or date of her dreams wants to see her in an hour... A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE ... a youth she's content to leave behind.... A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE .... a past juicy enough that she's looking forward to retelling it in her old age.... A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE ..... a set of screwdrivers, a cordless drill, and a black lace bra... A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE .... one friend who always makes her laugh... and one who lets her cry... A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE .... a good piece of furniture not previously owned by anyone else in her family... A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE .... eight matching plates, wine glasses with stems, and a recipe for a meal that will make her guests feel honored... A WOMAN SHOULD HAVE .... a feeling of control over her destiny... EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... how to fall in love without losing herself.. EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... HOW TO QUIT A JOB, BREAK UP WITH A LOVER, AND CONFRONT A FRIEND WITHOUT RUINING THE FRIENDSHIP... EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... when to try harder... and WHEN TO WALK AWAY... EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... that she can't change the length of her calves, the width of her hips, or the nature of her parents.. EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... that her childhood may not have been perfect...but it's over... EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... what she would and wouldn't do for love or more... EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... how to live alone... even if she doesn't like it... EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... whom she can trust, whom she can't, and why she shouldn't take it personally... EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... where to go... be it to her best friend's kitchen table... or a charming inn in the woods... when her soul needs soothing... EVERY WOMAN SHOULD KNOW... what she can and can't accomplish in a day... a month...and a year..." -- Pamela Redmond Satran

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "A good friend will always stab you in the front." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Anggie add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "When you're in jail, a good friend will be trying to bail you out. A best friend will be in the cell next to you saying, 'Damn, that was fun'." -- Groucho Marx
